titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2311) making appropriations for energy and water development for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2002, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-260, by Mr. Sessions.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 2311.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 88.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 272.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 421 - 2 (Roll no. 415).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/1/2001--Passed House without amendment. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2311 (FY 2002 energy and water development appropriations).
